books.author: by E.L. James
books.description: The final chapter of the Fifty Shades as Told by Christian trilogy delves into the wedding between Christian Grey and Anastasia Steele.
books.name: FREED

books.author: by Elin Hilderbrand
books.description: A Nantucket novelist gets one final summer to watch what happens from the great beyond.
books.name: GOLDEN GIRL

books.author: by Taylor Jenkins Reid
books.description: Four famous siblings throw an epic party to celebrate the end of summer. But over the course of 24 hours, their lives will change forever.
books.name: MALIBU RISING

books.author: by Laura Dave
books.description: Hannah Hall discovers truths about her missing husband and bonds with his daughter from a previous relationship.
books.name: THE LAST THING HE TOLD ME

books.author: by Casey McQuiston
books.description: August meets the girl of her dreams on a New York subway only to find she’s from another time.
books.name: ONE LAST STOP

books.author: by Andy Weir
books.description: Ryland Grace awakes from a long sleep alone and far from home, and the fate of humanity rests on his shoulders.
books.name: PROJECT HAIL MARY

books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: Threats put in rhymes and sent from shifting locations escalate as the daughter of a successful fitness celebrity’s own yoga business grows.
books.name: LEGACY

books.author: by Delia Owens
books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING

books.author: by Emily Henry
books.description: Opposites Poppy and Alex meet to vacation together one more time in hopes of saving their relationship.
books.name: PEOPLE WE MEET ON VACATION

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: Samuel Sooleymon receives a basketball scholarship to North Carolina Central and determines to bring his family over from a civil war-ravaged South Sudan.
books.name: SOOLEY

books.author: by Matt Haig
books.description: Nora Seed finds a library beyond the edge of the universe that contains books with multiple possibilities of the lives one could have lived.
books.name: THE MIDNIGHT LIBRARY

books.author: by Zakiya Dalila Harris
books.description: Tension unfurls when two young Black women meet against the starkly white backdrop of New York City book publishing.
books.name: THE OTHER BLACK GIRL

books.author: by Stuart Woods and Bryon Quertermous
books.description: In the fifth book of the Teddy Fay novels, Fay is tasked with resolving a threat at a film festival abroad.
books.name: JACKPOT

books.author: by Alex Michaelides
books.description: Theo Faber looks into the mystery of a famous painter who stops speaking after shooting her husband.
books.name: THE SILENT PATIENT

books.author: by Kristin Hannah
books.description: As dust storms roll during the Great Depression, Elsa must choose between saving the family and farm or heading West.
books.name: THE FOUR WINDS
